description: My place is close to The Royal Palms Shuffleboard Club, Ample Hills Creamery, Flatbush Farm, Chuko Ramen, Weather Up,Barclays Center, Green Building. You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood, the comfy bed, coziness. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Queen Bed Room in Gowanus Boutique Hotel
